continue-speak: Please, continue to speak with Okibro!
audio-permission-error: Click to continue or allow browser to play audio.
not-enough-credits: You do not have enough credits to start this lesson. Please buy more credits.
exit-lesson-confirmation: Are you sure you want to finish your lesson? Credits for the current lesson will be deducted anyway.
start-new-lesson-confirmation: Are you sure you want to start a new lesson? Credits for the current lesson will be deducted anyway.
internal-server-error: Oh no, I feel bad and I can’t answer you now. Please reload the page and I’ll probably feel better. If not, please ask for support.
